permissions: Allowed if the user has delegated create permission on the related work order, or if the assignment user is the current user and the user is a technician in the brokers business unit and the work orders responsible party business unit.
side_effects: Creates a work order assignment linking a user to a work order.
validation_notes: Both --work-order and --user are required. Work order and user must exist if IDs are provided. User ID must be unique per work order ID.
